Summary: Three Orange Circular Shaped objects moved somewhat fast across the sky in a upward motion and then quickly disappeared.
divs: Sighting DetailsWe went outside to look at the lightning, and as we were searching the sky we saw three orange glowing objects moving somewhat fast in a upward emotion across the sky for thirty seconds or so and then disappeared.
trends: There have been 3 other sightings in St Peters
There were no other sightings in St Peters on or around July 7th 2012
